com.googlecode.starrating
Class StarRating

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  com.googlecode.starrating.StarRating
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class StarRating
extends javax.swing.JPanel

StarRating Class StarRating is a JPanel that holds images of half stars The rate ranges from 0 to the number of stars with a step of 0.5.
The rate is shown in the ValueLabel which can be visible or not
A RemoveButton (which can be disabled too) sets the rate to 0.0
When the rate changes a property change event is fired.The properties name is RATE_CHANGED. A PropertyChangeListener can be attached to the StarRating to perform additional tasks (eg save rate to a database etc)
When StarRating is used as a cell editor a CellEditorListener can be attached to the editor and listen for CellEditorListener.editingStopped(javax.swing.event.ChangeEvent) to get the StarRating new value.

Since:
version 0.9
See Also:
Serialized Form
